name: stellarterm-desktop
description: Electron wrapped around StellarTerm. Originally from https://github.com/electron/electron-quick-start

scripts.zip: cd release-builds/StellarTerm-darwin-x64; zip -r ../stellarterm-osx.zip StellarTerm.app;cd ..;zip -r stellarterm-32bit.zip StellarTerm-win32-ia32/;zip -r stellarterm-64bit.zip StellarTerm-win32-x64/;
